The 10th USENIX Workshop on Free and Open Communications on the Internet (FOCI20), 11 August 2020
changes in the digital filtering policies?
The Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is considered one of the most conservative countries in the world
What is being blocked? Violations of the Islamic values
Shares contents considered Immoral: Pedophilia, drugs, pornography, gambling
What content is filtered? How is filtering implemented?
All apps are blocked in 2017. All
Internet filtering is based on HTTP
We tested the reachability of the most popular websites based on Alexa ranking
* Z. Nabi, The Anatomy of Web Censorship in Pakistan, USENIX FOCI13
We conducted a systematic study on 18 mobile applications
From 2013-2017, CITC blocked all VoIP call services
In 2017, CITC announced to lift the ban
We evaluated their connectivity from 2018 to 2020
